1.content:
Alright, this chapter is about splitting off into the various things. I have a bit of an explanation for each of them. Each story line will have at least two male and two female main characters. These characters will not have to be the ones who grow/shrink/etc, merely who's POV it will be.

One of each gender's story will have both a 'normal story, and an 'extreme' story. The 'normal' story will be almost as if it could happen. Like a person gains extra muscle, but not beyond what they could get in the real world, even if they were to get it through a means that can't happen, like a muscle growth machine or something. The 'extreme' story is just that...Extreme. Maybe a person gains muscle through a muscle growth machine, but to an insane degree, with the strength of million, if not billions of men or more!

The fifth choice for each of the next chapters will be a 'super extreme' choice. It'll be a bit more specific choice but done in such a way to push the limits of what you think you can think of.

Muscle and strength differences: Whether it just be about a bully torturing a wimpy kid or that same wimpy kid gaining incredible strength, it fits in here. Muscle isn't necessary for strength if you wish, but no people higher than about...7 feet tall or any shorter than about 4 feet. Keep that for the next one...

Height differences: Pretty straightforward. Maybe an experiment gone wrong makes a woman bigger than the sun, or the opposite, a man becomes a millimeter or smaller in height. There's a lot of GT/GTS stories on here, this one really doesn't need as much talking about.

Weight differences: This is only for differences in weight in terms of fat and such. Maybe a guy never had a good diet, or maybe a skinny fellow is forced up to a feeding machine which causes him to get fat, REALLY fat.

Inflation differences: There's a lot of these as well. These will be mostly about the growing probably. Helium, air, water, etc, it's all allowed.

Sexual Organs size differences: A bit different, this focuses more on specific parts. Namely penis and testicles for men, and mammaries for women. Perhaps a guy uses a pill to become hung like a porn star, or a woman uses a growth 'gun' to make her boobs the size of planets! That sorta stuff.

1211.content:
Okay here's a couple of choices:

1) Rivella is a world full of technology and fantasy. Human civilizations live in massive cities, virtually free of crime, pollution, poverty, or practically any other social problem. In return, they are subject to strict genetic and cultural control, including the elimination of people determined to be "non-prime". Kole, Nolak, and Aric are brothers who, ten years ago when they were 3, 4, and 6, respectively, were labeled "non-prime" due to the rebellious actions of their father. Their mother attempted to smuggle them out of Dworin, the largest city and their home, into the Wildlands, but she was killed in the process. The boys were able to escape, and they lived alone in a remote forest of the Wildlands for the past decade, not having contact with any other humans. However, through some fortune, they have survived and thrived on their own in the wild. In addition, some mystical and unknown property of the forest has stimulated and accelerated their growth, causing them all to now stand between ten and fifteen feet tall. Now, a science expedition from Dworin has started to make their first survey of the Wildlands, meaning the boys, now teenagers, are about to come in contact with civilization again.

2) Chad has just moved to college. It's his freshmen year and he's super excited to meet new friends, learn new things, and explore the beautiful, if somewhat small, campus of Indian Creek University. He gets all his stuff settled in, and is ready to meet his new roommate. However, when he does meet Skylar, he finds that he has a lot to get used to. Whereas Chad is somewhat messy, Skylar is meticulously neat. Chad is outgoing and popular, while Skylar is shy, with only a few friends. Chad is straight, Skylar is bisexual. The list goes on. Oh yeah, one more: Chad is 5' 11" with a muscular, athletic build, while Skylar is slim and 11' 1" tall. Perhaps that is the most shocking thing of all (perhaps?). Chad tries to get used to living with a giant, while Skylar struggles with continuing to be different, even in a new place. Maybe, if everything works out, the two can someday call each other friends.
1211.title: Male character (growing)

choices: Let them pass, and then we'll follow them, seeing what they're up to.
12111.content:
As the small exploring party made their way through the overgrown trees and bushes in the Lost Forest of the Wildlands, they had no idea that they were being watched by six larger-than-usual eyes. These six large eyes belonged to three boys, who were hidden safely away in a particularly thick grove of trees, studying their every move.

"Who are they?" Kole whispered to his brothers. At thirteen, he was the youngest of the group, stood fourteen-and-a-half feet tall, and had the leanest physique, slender and smooth, clear of body hair for the most part. He was a curious, playful boy, always loving to joke around with his brothers. But he also proved loyal and obedient, still willing to follow their advice and directions. His shoulder-length, unkempt blonde hair only served to accentuate his best feature, his piercing blue eyes.

"Dworinians," Aric replied. "And keep your voice down!" he hissed in a lower tone. As the eldest and most clever of the brothers, the sixteen-year-old was unquestionably the group's leader. Though he was the shortest at a hair under thirteen feet (as the result of being older than his brothers when they arrived and thus living a smaller percentage of his life with the forest's growth stimulation), he made up for it with agility and speed, being able to climb any tree in the forest in seconds flat. The past few years of forest living had been kind to him, giving him a muscular, sexy build (though there was really no one else around to compare it to). He also was the only one of the brothers who bothered to regularly cut and groom his dark-brown hair, keeping it short and (using tree sap for gel) spiky.

Nolak growled lowly when he heard Aric say the word 'Dworinians'. "What are they doing in our Forest?" he muttered. The tallest of the three at fifteen feet two inches, Nolak had received the most benefit from the decade of living in the forest, and was certainly a beast of a boy, with broad shoulders and large, smooth pecs, biceps, abs, and thighs. He could easily lift either of his brothers off of their feet with one arm. He had an aggressive attitude, quick to anger and a fight, but never let it spoil his rock-solid relationship with his brothers. His dark-auburn hair was shaggy and thicker than either Kole or Aric, almost always covering his face.

The three boys had lived with each other, and no one else, for the past ten years. Though they did not get the pleasures and amenities of 'modern citysphere living', they didn't miss them. Besides, Aric was the only one with any real memories of living in Dworin, as the other two were too young when they left the citysphere for anything big to stick. They lived off of what they could harvest from the forest: plants, berries, and sometimes, as they grew older, even the meat of an animal that they had managed to hunt down (though they preferred to keep the peace with most of the creatures of the Wildlands, living and letting live). After they had worn out and outgrown their clothes a year in, they hadn't bothered with replacing them, and to this day were unashamed to be naked around each other.

Only occasionally had they even seen a glimpse of any other humans, and that was at the northern edge of the Lost Forest, along the Beggar's Trail that lead from Dworin to the merchant's hub citysphere of Falda. Most of the time, the humans were government trade-guards, armed with their Lightning Blades or Disruptor Bolt rifles, as they jogged alone or in pairs alongside hovercarts loaded up with unidentifiable merchandise. Sometimes, it was a lone traveler, looking scared and lost, like something was about to jump out and drag them off kicking and screaming into the woods. Whatever the case, though, the humans always wore layer after layer of protective clothing: masks, jackets, gloves, pants and hats, no matter how stifling hot the temperature was, in an attempt to shield themselves from the "dangers" of the unfiltered air outside the cityspheres.

That's what made this small group of Dworinians so different and interesting. Not only were they straying off the Beggar's Trail, they were also wearing the minimum in protective clothing: just a long-sleeve shirt, slim-looking pants, and a simple (if high-tech) mask around their nose and mouth. They didn't seem to be in fear, or even hostility like the guards. They were studious, curious - quite an unusual group, for Dworinians at least.

"What should we do?" Kole asked as the group began to get closer. He fidgeted a little, his nervousness and his inquisitiveness battling inside of him.

"I'd say let's attack 'em." Nolak flexed his arm muscles as he began to furrow his brow. "We could wipe out the whole lot of them in a minute, tops."

"Ssssh," Aric motioned to both of them, as the group got closer, and the boys finally got a good look at each of them. The group seemed to be led by a man in his late twenties, with a strong, handsome face and a decent, if not overly-impressive, build. He kept motioning to the others, telling them which direction to head and what to do. Right behind him was another man, younger (seemingly only a few years older than Aric), taller but very lanky, with glasses, holding a hand-held device that he kept entering data into and looking at the results. The third person happened to be a female, with long dirty-blonde hair and a smooth face, probably about the same age as the leader. Each of the boys hadn't gotten a close look at a female human in over a decade, and she definitely held their interest. Finally, at the rear of the group was a gruff-looking man, probably twenty years older than any of the other party members. He had a medium-trimmed, rough-looking black beard, and was a slight bit on the stocky side. He was also the only one of the group carrying a weapon, a small Disruptor Bolt pistol in its holster on his left hip. Aric guessed that he was the security guard of the group.

As they got closer, Aric turned to look at each of his brothers, catching eye contact, and trying to decide what to do. Finally, he whispered…
12111.title: Watching From Their Hideout

12112.content:
Chad just arrived in college. It was getting dark outside, but he was spending the morning going around campus and getting to know most of first year students. He was always a very friendly type. "Relationships are the foundation of advancement." His father thought. "Or we can just have fun together." He thought.
Now he walked down the hallway to his room. He will know his roommate. He thought he would easily make friends with him.
He opens the door and enters. Thump. Chad is on the ground.
"I stumbled?" He asks as he looks back. The object is a shoe. A shoe that is next to his partner by the wall. Simple canvas shoes but not average. Because it's 1'9 long. He can't understand what he sees. Why would someone need such a shoe.
"You hit yourself? I'm really sorry. Next time I'll try to put them down better." A voice said.
Chad turns around and finds himself facing two black socks. The socks cover huge feet. Size like the previous shoes. Chad lifts his head. He looks over a long, thin body. The person's head bends over his head. It's not surprising. The boy could not fit otherwise.
"Are you okay?" The boy asks again.
"Well I do. Yes." Chad said and stood up. His eyes are in line with the boy's groin.
"My name is Skylar." He said shamefully.
"Chad."
Skylar is silent and hasn't moved.
"You are a little ..." Chad starts to say, but he stopped when he saw Skylar frown nervously. "... you look young." Finish it.
"Ye .. ye.. yes. I'm only 17 years old. I jumped for a couple of years." He explained.
"Yes he couldn't deny it. Long light brown hair, green eyes with frameless glasses, slim body and a huge 'I love science' captioned t-shirt." Thought Chad.
"Then I'm gonna unpack my stuff." Chad says and goes inside.
"Yes ... if ... you are not angry ... you would do it ... but only if it doesn't bother you. Would you take off your shoes? I just cleaned and packed it. "
"Oh man. It won't be easy." Chad thought.
12112.title: Chad and Skylar

122121.content:
It all started innocently enough.

You had been paired with Jordan since the beginning of the semester as his lab partner, and through the first two months he had barely said more than two words to you, outside of whatever was necessary to complete each week's lab experiment. It was a shame too, because he was kinda cute, in a mysterious, quiet sort of way.

However, one day as the two of you were working on an experiment, you accidentally mixed two different chemicals that suddenly started to fizz over the edge of the beaker. You panicked, reaching out to grab it to throw it into the sink, but the beaker immediately burned your hand, causing you to involuntarily throw it… right against Jordan. Luckily, after a trip to the emergency wash station, Jordan seemed to have no lasting damage… or so you thought.

The next day of school, though, you noticed that Jordan looked a little different. You weren't quite sure what it was, but you could swear the clothes on him were… slightly tighter, for some reason. The day after that confirmed it, as Jordan had significantly grown by then, and was now not one of the shortest boys in the class but the tallest, his shirt leaving his midriff exposed and his pants only coming halfway down his thigh. Jordan definitely looked uncomfortable in this situation, but still seemed to be rather quiet, not saying much about it, although it was clearly obvious and became the talk of the school.

That was a Friday. When Monday rolled around, Jordan didn't show up at school. You instantly started to feel guilty, wondering if somehow, being bathed with chemicals like that had done something to affect him. That guilt lasted up until you got out of school, for as soon as you left the school ground, you saw something that shocked you to the core.
122121.title: An Experiment Gone Awry

choices: "You're just so small to me! What are you going to do?"
1222.content:
Eric (18) had always had a fantasy. Namely to shrink. More specifically to shrink in front of a very hot guy. Eventually Eric got his chance to do just that.

He found out through the various macro/micro sites he visited of a machine called the "Super-Shrinker 2000" that a lot of people were buying. He decided to get one. He got the 'hot guy' aspect in by calling over his very very hot neighbor, Colin (20). He said that he just needed 'help moving something', and the six foot tall, 250 pound wants-to-be-a-pro-BB'er eagerly came over.

Eric called Colin into his bedroom where the machine was set up.

"Just...stay there." said Eric to Colin as he entered his room.
"Uhh...what's going on?" he asked.
"You'll see." replied Eric.

The machine was rather large, but not terribly complicated to use. The person to be shrunk stood in a rectangular glass booth with some equipment above their heads. It generally needed a second person, but the machine could be set up to a thirty second timer if the person was alone. The machine itself could shrink a person anywhere from just a smidge shorter, all the way to quite literally shrinking someone out of existence. Now it had safeties to help prevent that from happening, so most people couldn't do that; the lowest regular setting was roughly 1/1000th of a millimeter.

Eric wasn't going to go that small. He figured six inches was good. He had already set the timer as Colin walked in, and shut the booth as Colin still stood there, confused. As the timer hit zero a wide green beam came from the top of the booth and covered his body. Almost immediately he felt a bit of a head rush, and everything started to look bigger.

Colin saw something odd and immediately came over to the booth but was unsure about doing anything. He thought that Eric looked a little smaller, when in fact, he was. It was soon far more apparent as Eric's head inched not only lower, but smaller. Eric looked up at his neighbor who seemed to be getting taller and taller.

Soon Eric was four feet tall, and his clothes were incredibly baggy on him. That was a quick memory as that became three feet and Eric was eye level with Colin's crotch. Soon that turned into two feet, then one foot, and finally the machine clicked off and opened the booth when he finally ended at a mere six inches tall.

Colin immediately began searching through the pile of clothes, and quickly found the now-naked Eric. He opened his mouth and said...
1222.title: The Shrinking Machine

12223.content:
Colin stared with wide eyes, mouth agape in disbelief at what he had just witnessed. He couldn't believe what he was seeing, yet there it was, his neighbour who just moments ago was the size of any normal person had now been reduced to the size of an action figure.
He squatted down and carefully plucked Eric out of the pile of clothing, placing him next to it instead where he could see him better, “W...What's going on??” he spoke down to the tiny person before him.

Eric however stared up, and up, and up at his seemingly giant neighbour, he has waited his whole life for a moment like this, to be so small in front of such a hot guy, he didn't even try to cover his obvious arousal, he simply stood there for a moment to take in and admire his new giant world, “I wanted to show you this awesome shrinking machine I just got. Isn't it amazing?” the tiny man replied.

“This can't be real” said Colin as he extended a finger and reached down to poke and prod Eric a few times to make sure it wasn't some sort of illusion like a hologram.

The pokes shoved Eric back a couple of steps, nearly knocking him over, he was loving every second of it, being touched and toyed with by this handsome giant.
Finally the giant hand wrapped around the tiny man and lifted him high into the air, Colin held Eric in his palms and started to look over him, “I see you're enjoying this...” he nodded down, obviously talking about Eric's raging erection, “But why would you shrink yourself down like this?”

Eric felt his heart racing, at the situation, he was now being held by this guy he liked so very much, he was so caught up in the moment that he almost didn't know what to say, “I.. um. Well I've always kind of wanted to be shrunk down, to see what it would be like, especially to share this experience with someone else.”

Colin nodded along and smiled, “I think I understand. This is incredible. You're so small... but if you want to be shrunk, how about we take things a little further?”

Before Eric had a chance to respond he was being lowered down back onto the machines pad again, it was like being in a fast moving elevator as he was moved quickly to the ground. He saw the huge pile of clothes next to him get swept away by the giant, put aside so they wouldn't get in the way, “Wait, how much further?” he yelled up, hoping the giant could hear him as he moved to the control panel.

Colin heard the quiet voice and chuckled, “Oh, don't worry, you'll see.” and with that he started inspecting the panel, it seemed easy enough to use. He keyed in some new information and started it up again.
The machined started to emit a hum as it activated, the booth was once again filled with a green glow as the beam surrounded everything within it.

Eric didn't know how to react, he was both scared and excited at the same time now that the shrinking process was out of his control, he could only watch as the already enormous surroundings started to increase in size again as he dwindled away.
Colin stepped in front of the booth and squatted down once again to watch his neighbour get even smaller, secretly loving the idea of being the big guy, which was perfect since Eric wanted to be the small guy for him.

The 6 inch Eric was steadily reduced to 5 inches... then 4... then 3, from his point of view Colin was going from being a giant to being a god, and he had no objections to that, he could worship this titan for as long as it takes, his fantasies were coming true, he could only imagine the possibilities at what he could do with such a massive man.
Two inches came and went, soon replaced by one single inch, but things weren't stopping, he was still getting smaller. Eventually though the shrinking faded away, leaving him at a single solitary centimetre tall.

The world was so huge now, his own room was like the size of a city, and there in front of him was his now even more titanic neighbour, standing bigger than a skyscraper and reaching down for him once again.

Colin tried to be as gentle as he could, placing his hand down next to the tiny man, “Climb on” he said, to which Eric quickly obeyed and climbed up into the enormous palm.
He was raised back up into the air and found himself in front of Colin's huge smiling face who said...
12223.title: "Only six inches? Not small enough!"

choices: Stay on Colin's chest to relax
122231.content:
Colin stepped over to the bed with the tiny Eric still standing in his palm. He sat down on the edge and stared down at the shrunken man, “hmm, you're so small now. What could we do like this?” he said quietly.

To Eric the whole situation was beyond incredible. He was living out his greatest fantasy. All he could do in that moment was stare up at Colin's mountainous face which was hovering above him, filling his view. In his mind he wanted to worship his giant neighbour like some sort of god, to fall to his knees and kiss the fleshy ground beneath him, but instead he tried to play it a little more cool, for now at least.
Colin's voice rumbled deeply in Eric's ears due to such a large size difference, it was just deep and loud enough to snap him out of his daydreams. Eric had planned to shrink himself but hadn't really thought ahead to what he would do next, after all he had no idea how his neighbour would react to all of this. Now that everything was going better than he could have hoped for he had to improvise what to do next. He stared up into the huge sparkling eyes of his giant neighbour and took a moment to think, “Um... would it be okay to put me on your chest for a while?” he started, “It would be so cool to compare myself to your body at this size.”

The words coming from the shrunken man sounded like barely audible squeaks to Colin, he leaned his head closer and tilted his ear to Eric to better hear him. Eric shouted his request up again and this time Colin was able to hear him, he moved his head back again and nodded down, “Sure thing little man, I think I'll enjoy this almost as much as you will” he said as a slight playful grin spread its way across his face.

Colin stood up and walked over to the set of drawers at the edge of the room and lowered his hand to the top of it, “Hop off for a minute little guy” he said down to Eric who immediately did as he was told and hopped down to the wooden surface.

Once Eric was set down, Colin took a step back and grasped the bottom of his shirt, with a smile he began to lift it up, slowly pulling it off, revealing row after row of well toned abs, The shirt continued to be lifted higher, past the giants chest and was soon over his head, then tossed down onto the floor.

Eric could only stare up in amazement as his neighbour took off his top above him. He had seen Colin shirtless plenty of times before, but at this size it was almost unreal, even the smallest of his friends muscles far out sized him at this point, he was practically squirming with excitement.

Colin's hand reappeared at the top of the desk moments later and Eric quickly scrambled back up into the palm. The seemingly giant man walked back over to the bed and lay down on top of the soft springy mattress. He placed his hand on his chest, right between his pectoral muscles, then nodded down to Eric who quickly hopped down again, this time onto his friends chest.

The giant hand moved away but his face kept watch over the shrunken man.

Eric felt the ground beneath his feet, so warm, so soft, he leaned down to rub his hand over it, tickling the giant slightly, the simple small laugh from Colin rumbled through his chest, shaking the small man around, causing him to fall back onto his rump.
When the rumbling was over Eric stood back up and looked at his surroundings, above him was his neighbours face staring down at his, to either side were the small hills which made up his pectorals, behind him were the hills and valleys of his abs, and beyond that was the rather large bulge pushing up against the fabric between his legs.

He didn't know where to start, should he just lay here and relax to enjoy the moment? Or perhaps go out exploring.
122231.title: Now how about we find something to do together?

choices: Colin looks for something around the room to help him see Eric better.
122232.content:
Colin stared down at the tiny man in his hand, fascinated by the whole situation, “This is incredible. You're so tiny now. Just how small can this thing make you?”

Eric looked back up at his giant neighbour, equally as fascinated by what was happening, he had only planned on shrinking down to six inches but he had to admit that the view of his friend at one centimetre was even more astounding, he was enjoying this size more than he could imagine, especially since he was sharing the experience with someone he cared for. Colin's voice rumbled above, loud and deep. Eric tried to respond but his voice was like a quiet squeak to his giant friend.

Colin leaned his ear in closer to hear the tiny man who called back up again, “It can make things incredibly small, but there are safeguards to prevent things from shrinking out of existence.”

Colin moved his ear away and nodded down, “That's good. I wouldn't want to lose you or anything” he smiled, “but... I have to admit, I have had some fantasies about being a giant, to be able to grow and shrink things. Don't worry, I'd never do anything bad or harmful, but... would you mind if I made you even smaller? Seeing someone shrink right in front of me was amazing, and seeing myself being so huge to another person is such a rush. I'll keep you safe. You trust me don't you?”

Eric's heart started beating faster again, partly from fear and partly from excitement. This was a match made in heaven, one person who wants to shrink for his neighbour, and the neighbour wanting to feel huge. There was a moment of hesitation, but Eric believes Colin's words, he trusts this giant to keep him safe, at any size. He thinks it over for a moment longer before nodding up and calling out that he is okay with the idea.

“Great!” Colin says as he lowers his hand back down to the platform of the machine. His tiny passenger hops off and stands ready in the centre of it.
Everything looks so huge to Eric now that he can't even imagine what it will look like when the door next opens.

Colin closed the booth door and walked back over to the control panel, “hmm, how small?” he thought to himself, “Don't want to go too wild just yet.”

He tapped away at the controls, putting in the new settings before activating the machine. The beam at the top began charging up as Colin made his way back to the booth door to watch the action.
The beam fires down, covering Eric completely. Within moments the tiny man can feel the familiar tingling as his body begins to dwindle away once again, he looks over his own body and can feel the floor sliding out in all directions beneath his feet.

Outside the booth Colin watches in fascination as the 1cm tall man begins to shrink even further, he gets down on his hands and knees and leans his head as close to the glass booth as possible, watching the millimetres slowly drain away from the man inside.
He was loving every moment of what he was seeing and hoped that Eric would soon enjoy his new view of the world too, he squirmed with excitement and couldn't resist giving that thickening bulge between his legs a soft squeeze, letting out a pleasurable groan as he thought about how huge he is now compared to his friend.

Smaller and smaller Eric became, already down to 3mm, then 2, then the beam finally cut out leaving him at a single millimetre tall, practically a speck to the world at this point.

The door swung open and Colin crawled inside on his hands and knees, searching for his tinier friend on the pad, eventually spotting a small moving speck below him.

Eric on the other hand heard a loud click after the beam shut off indicating that the door had opened. He wondered how small he was now and his question was answered seconds later as a shadow was cast over him. He looked up and his heart began pounding in his chest, above him was the biggest thing he had ever seen. He could barely make out all of it at once as it stretched miles in front of him. But he knew what it was right away, it was his neighbour, Colin, larger than anything he could have possibly imagined, he was no longer a giant, that word couldn't do justice to just how insanely huge he seemed now. He was like some sort of god.
Eric jumped up and down, waving his arms like crazy to signal his massive neighbour who was slowly leaning closer. Before long a single huge eye filled the sky above him.

What sounded like booming thunder echoed around him, but with a bit of concentration he could make it out to be Colin's voice, “Oh my god. This is amazing. You're so small!”

info.description:
Alright, this is a pretty open story. The focus isn't about the how or why someone gets bigger or whatever, but mostly what they do, and more importantly, what they do and act compared to others.

For example: A guy is given extreme strength one day, and suddenly instead of being something like the nerd on campus, he's the BMOC, and tougher than anyone else. He then proceeds to make sure everyone knows he's tough, and nobody can stop him.

Or perhaps a woman is 1,500 feet tall (with no reason given, she just is) but is very benevolent and kind, helping others as much as possible, while trying to cause as little destruction as possible with her massive body. Or even the exact opposite, maybe a person is only like an inch tall (again, with no reason, he or she simply is), and has had to live their whole life like that.



Now of course, by no means is this something you have to follow. It's mostly met as a general idea. This is 18+ for a reason though, so sex is fine..

I have no real rules to this one, I mostly wanted to try this as an idea to see what it might be like. If you want just growth or shrinking (based on the story line of course) stories, I'm perfectly alright with that.

However, I do still reserve the full right to edit to delete chapters if I believe it necessary.
